info.name: 王梦荫
info.profile: Mengyin Wang received the B.Eng. degree in computer science and technology from Nanjing University of Science and Technology, Nanjing, China, in 2012. She is currently working toward the Ph.D. degree in computer science and technology at Nanjing University of Science and Technology. From Jan. 2017 to Sep. 2018, she is a visiting scholar in the Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering at National University of Singapore. Her current research interests include multimedia analysis and deep learning.
info.profile_c: 南京理工大学计算机科学与工程学院在读博士生。2012年于南京理工大学计算机科学于工程学院获得学士学位。2017年1月至2018年9月，作为联合培养博士研究生在新加坡国立大学交流访问。主要研究方向为，多媒体分析和深度学习。
